thread.title: At Least Justin Timberlake Is Having Fun at the Oscars with His Opening Performance of "Can't Stop the Feeling"
thread.title_full: At Least Justin Timberlake Is Having Fun at the Oscars with His Opening Performance of "Can't Stop the Feeling"

author: Matt Miller
title: At Least Justin Timberlake Is Having Fun at the Oscars with His Opening Performance of "Can't Stop the Feeling"
text: By Matt Miller Feb 26, 2017 Everyone at the Oscars and watching at home heard Justin Timberlake's "Can't Stop the Feeling" for the millionth time on Sunday. He opened the show like a high school prom, and the folks in the Dolby Theatre did their best to fake-dance along. They tried so hard. But JT kept going, into a sexy breakdown, into "Lovely Day," into a clapping sing-along portion, but Jeff Bridges, Casey Affleckâ€”they don't do dancing. At least Timberlake is having a good time tonight. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
